articles.title: 13-man Sharks beat Harlequins in enthralling, controversial Champions Cup opener - News24
articles.description: Both sides scored five tries, Ox Nche suffered a red card, three players scored doubles as the Sharks beat Harlequins 39-31 in an enthralling, yet controversial first South African game in the European Champions Cup at Kings Park on Saturday.

articles.title: Japanese dengue vaccine becomes second approved by EU - GMA News Online
